abstract: Google purchased a video game advertising firm, Adscape, to expand into in-game advertising, Google said on Friday. Financial details were not disclosed, but Red Herring last month reported the value of the expected deal at about $23 million.
lead_paragraph: Google purchased a video game advertising firm, Adscape, to expand into in-game advertising, Google said on Friday. Financial details were not disclosed, but Red Herring last month reported the value of the expected deal at about $23 million.

headline.main: Google Buys Adscape to Expand in Video Game Advertising

abstract: Microsoft‘s move to buy Tellme for about $800 million represents a boon for Benchmark Capital, as well as Kleiner Perkins Caufield and Byers, but no home run on the order of Google, says The Red Herring.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft‘s move to buy Tellme for about $800 million represents a boon for Benchmark Capital, as well as Kleiner Perkins Caufield and Byers, but no home run on the order of Google, says The Red Herring.

headline.main: Benchmark Reaps Rewards of Microsoft’s Tellme Deal
